text: Ej kasone, ki ʙa Allohu Rasulas imon ovardaed, cun sumoro gujand, dar maclisho coj vase' kuned, pas coj vase' kuned, to Alloh dar dunjovu oxirat ʙaroi sumo vase' kunad. Va cun gujand, ki ʙarxezed, ʙarxezed. Alloh onhoero, ki imon ovardaand va kasonero, ki axli ilm meʙosand ʙa daracahoi ʙalandi savoʙ va martaʙahoi rizvon ʙardorad va Alloh ta'olo ʙa korhoe, ki mekuned, ogoh ast. Az U cize maxfi namemonad va muvofiqi on sumoro cazo medihad
